title: What is the environment to give a child where he can learn not to get involved in alcohols and drugs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Teenagers need the attention they can get from their parents. And what they really need is someone who can understand the emotional difficulties they are into. They don’t need someone who would preach sermon to them. They need parents who can become their friends and who are willing to understand them. In many cases this alone can already help solve anxiety and depression issues in teens, and hence substance abuse. Read more here : Anxiety in Children
